Our specialty is innovative concrete foundations and flatwork for residential and commercial properties.

Whether it’s a foundation or an outside environment, we take pride in adding aristry, craftsmanship and customer service in all our projects. We’re a personable, local business serving Jefferson County, Washington. We invite you to explore our selection of striking, high-quality projects we’ve showcased for you to enjoy here.

Budget: Home improvement projects are investments that when done right, improve your lifestyle and home value. We’ll work within your approved budget throughout the entire process.

Shawn and Sarah Canepa live in Blyn – a step away from their horses and a short drive from the snow and surf. They are fully committed to the North Olympic Peninsula and love to share their passion for the area with the clients they serve.

(360) 681-2211
